document_data.caption: A map showing Maribar Island off the coast of the Pearl Cities.
document_data.name: Maribar Island
document_data.mainbody: '''Maribar Island''' was located off of the eastern coast of the [[Pearl Cities]] region of [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Maribar Island covered roughly {{SI|900|sq mi|k}} of land. The town of [[Samak]] was the only settlement of any considerable size found on the island, though numerous pirate hideouts were probably scattered across the island's coast as well.
document_data.Geography: The island was located in the [[Golden Gulf]] approximately {{SI|30|mi|k}} northeast of the city of [[Sikak]] on the mainland. The [[Bountiful Shoals]] separated Maribar Island from the coast of [[West Zakhara]].
